name_zh: 脚本功能已超出使用限制

description-guest.zh: 已经达到了免费版的代码行数限制。作为访客，您最多可以使用[b]{0}[/b]行，当前项目使用了[b]{1}[/b]行。[a1]注册账户[/a1]或[a2]登录[/a2]获取更多代码行，或订阅 Construct 解锁完整功能。
description-guest.en: You have reached the free edition limit on the number of lines of JavaScript code. As a guest you are allowed [b]{0}[/b] lines, and this project uses [b]{1}[/b] lines. [a1]Register an account[/a1] or [a2]log in[/a2] to get more lines of code, or purchase a plan to unlock the full features of Construct.

description-logged-in.zh: 您已经达到了免费版的代码行数限制。免费版最多可以使用[b]{0}[/b]行，当前项目使用了[b]{1}[/b]行。订阅 Construct 可以解锁完整功能。
description-logged-in.en: You have reached the free edition limit on the number of lines of JavaScript code. With a free account you are allowed [b]{0}[/b] lines, and this project uses [b]{1}[/b] lines. Purchase a plan to unlock the full features of Construct.
